me.pavva.PokeJava

Class Pokemon

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.pavva.PokeJava.Pokemon

  • public class Pokemon
extends Object
    me.pavva.PokeJava.Pokemon The class file which contains the constructor, get-set methods, and damage calculation function for pokemon
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Pranav A. Github: 20avva
    See Also:
    App

    • Constructor Detail

      • Pokemon

        public Pokemon(String pokemon_name,
               String pokemon_type,
               double pokemon_health,
               int pokemon_used_move,
               String pokemon_move1,
               String pokemon_move2,
               String pokemon_move3,
               String pokemon_move4)
        Pokemon object constuctor with optional params passed in
        Parameters:
        pokemon_name - - The name of the created pokemon as reffered to by the user
        pokemon_type - - The type of the pokemon, used in damage calculation
        pokemon_health - - The health of the pokemon, used in damage calculation
        pokemon_used_move - - The move a pokemon used, used by move checking
        pokemon_move1 - - The name of the first move a pokemon can use, reffered to by the user
        pokemon_move2 - - The name of the second move a pokemon can use, reffered to by the user
        pokemon_move3 - - The name of the third move a pokemon can use, reffered to by the user
        pokemon_move4 - - The name of the fourth move a pokemon can use, reffered to by the user
        See Also:
        Pokemon.Pokemon(), Pokemon.Attack(Pokemon, Pokemon, double, double)

      • Attack

        public static void Attack(Pokemon your,
                          Pokemon opponent,
                          double yourDamage,
                          double opponentDamage)
        The main damage calculation step of the battle simulations. Takes into account type effectivity and returns damage based on it
        Parameters:
        your - The pokemon which is controlled by the user
        oppponent - The pokemon which is controlled by the CPU
        yourDamage - The unmodified damage yourPoke recieves
        opponentDamage - The unmodified damage opponentPoke recieves
